## Education

**Indian Statistical Institute, Kolkata** | India<br/>
PhD in Statistics | Aug 2021 - June 2025<br/>
During my PhD, I was fortunate to work with [Ayanendranath Basu](https://scholar.google.co.in/citations?user=HiIWY7sAAAAJ&hl=en) and [Abhik Ghosh](https://www.isical.ac.in/~abhik.ghosh/). My doctoral thesis is about developing fast and scalable algorithms for robust SVD and robust PCA using the minimum density power divergence.

- If you are interested in applying these methods, see this [R package](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/rsvddpd/index.html) or this [Python package](https://pypi.org/project/decompy/).

- If you are more into maths, may be take a look at my PhD thesis [here](https://dspace.isical.ac.in/jspui/handle/10263/7574).
